document_data.name: Gentle Moon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gentle Moon''' was an inn within the walls of [[Westgate]] on the [[Dragon Coast]] as of [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Structure: The inn was in good condition and offered average prices.
document_data.Location: The Gentle Moon was found in the southeast section of the city.
document_data.Inhabitants: The owner of the inn was killed by members of a cult of [[Shar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1312}}. After the [[Time of Troubles]] the owner's [[ghost]] began haunting the inn with increasing violence and driving away most staff and customers.
